# Audit checklist for IEC62304 version 2006 AMD1:2015 Class A products (non Legacy)
#
# This checklist is not a substitute for reading, understanding, and implementing the associated standard.
# The descriptive phrase following each keyword reference is intended only as a helpful mnemonic for locating
# and recalling the referenced section of the standard.
#
include 62304_base_class_a
include 14971_2007
62304:5.1.8.c Documentation Planning: procedures
62304:5.2.2.f Software Requirements Content: user interface
62304:5.2.2.j@2015 Software Requirements Content: IT-network
62304:5.7.1 Establish tests for software requirements
62304:9.1 Prepare problem reports
